name: coderabbit-complete-localstorage
title: CodeRabbit Complete (LocalStorage)
description: Complete CodeRabbit integration with localStorage. Includes core functionality, React hook, form, branding, and localStorage adapter. Perfect for most browser-based applications and prototyping. No Convex dependency.
docs: Get CODERABBIT_API_KEY from https://app.coderabbit.ai/settings/api-keys (requires Pro plan). Use LocalStorageAdapter in your useCodeRabbit hook. This is the recommended bundle for most users - includes everything except Convex.
